topic.title: DIAGNOSIS (ICD RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE)
topic.shortdesc: DIAGNOSIS (ICD RECORDED ON DISCHARGE FROM NEONATAL CRITICAL CARE) is the ICD code describing a PATIENT DIAGNOSIS recorded when the PATIENT is discharged from neonatal critical care.
